page.title: 14ECONOMICS OF UPMINSTER
page.content:
There are many facilities in Upminster for both investing and borrowing money. Perhaps this is a reflection of our middle class catchment area. Most people are paid either by cheque or directly into their bank account.
All the major banks are represented together with all the leading building societies. Within our local shopping area there are 5 banks{_National {Westminster,Lloyds,Barclays,Midland and the{Trustee Savings Bank.}There are 16 building societies, some of which are counter services within estate agents.
Most people buying their homes are doing so with a building society mortgage.
